vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ch.15.1;
father of: Azariah (H5838M)
§ Oded = "restorer"
1) father of Azariah the prophet in the reign of king Asa of Judah
2) a prophet of Jehovah in Samaria at the time of Pekah's invasion of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   padre de Azarías, profeta, en tiempos del rey Asá; (b)   profeta; en tiempos del rey Ahaz
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
俄德 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "復原者"
1) 猶大王亞撒時先知亞撒利雅的父親 (代下 15:1,8)
2) 比加入侵猶大時在撒瑪利亞的一位耶和華的先知 (代下 28:9)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
俄德 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "复原者"
1) 犹大王亚撒时先知亚撒利雅的父亲 (代下 15:1,8)
2) 比加入侵犹大时在撒玛利亚的一位耶和华的先知 (代下 28:9)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.28.9
§ Oded = "restorer"
1) father of Azariah the prophet in the reign of king Asa of Judah
2) a prophet of Jehovah in Samaria at the time of Pekah's invasion of Judah
